Author: Darmani
Content:
There is evidence to say that marshmallows are bureaucracy and office politics, and eating them is engaging in those activities, but there is also strong evidence to support that marshmallows are bugs (and eating them is fixing them). They are likely both.

Remember the third M. This essay seems to both comment on Google and its bureaucracy, and Wyvern, full of bugs and a poor architecture created by a less experienced Steve Yegge, which he has been trying to improve since taking it offline nine months ago.

Author: Readmore
Content: I tend to agree, it would be cool to be able to access some of the internal features but there is so much you can do with a web application now that it's not really an issue.
